slidify制作slides虽然很方便，但是插入rCharts等交互图片的时候会存在无法显示的问题。网上能找到很多解决方案，但是都比较复杂，本文介绍一个简单的实现方法——使用iframe元素插入到slides中。以下演示下实现的整个过程 {r readData,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE} setwd(“E:/Document/R/DA_ComputerAd”) require(xlsx) require(recharts) require(digest) dat <- read.xlsx(file = “./data/data.xlsx”,sheetIndex = 1) dat$Date <- as.Date(dat$Date) dat$Group <- paste(dat$Plat,dat$Product,sep = ‘_’) dat$C2BRation <- dat$ClickUV/dat$BrowUV*100 dat$C2BRation[is.infinite(dat$C2BRation)] <- NA renderHtmlPlot <- function(obj,fileName){ fileName <- paste0(“E:/Document/R/DA_ComputerAd/assets/html/”, fileName,”.html”) obj$save(fileName) res <- paste0(“<iframe src='",fileName,"'></iframe>”) return(res) } ```

绘制交互

{r test1,echo=FALSE,results='asis',warning=FALSE,} require(rCharts) n1 <- nPlot(BrowPV ~ Date, data = dat, group = "Group", type = 'lineWithFocusChart') n1$xAxis( tickFormat = "#! function(d){ f = d3.time.format.utc('%Y-%m-%d'); return f(new Date( d*24*60*60*1000 )); } !#" ) cat(renderHtmlPlot(n1,fileName = "test1"))

```
